Reviews.Title: Happy Customer...
Reviews.Author: T. McDole
Reviews.Content: Cables seem to be of the same/better quality than the ones that come with the Samsung security camera kit...Cables arrived quickly, and appropriately packaged.  Quick test of the cables on the camera system proved they worked as expected (same/better than the 60' cables that came with the system), and give me the flexibility of installing some of the cameras at distances greater than what the 60' cables included with my camera system would allow.  Great product!

Reviews.Title: good quality cables
Reviews.Author: Walter O. Ledig
Reviews.Content: Cables were as described and were slightly heavier then those supplied by security camera mfg. Delivery was sooner then expected. I was very satisfied with the product and delivery. The 4 security camera project is complete and the cameras are performing as well with the longer cables as the ones on the 60 foot stock cables.

ProductInfo.Features:
High Quality Video Power Cables
Includes Coupler to link cables
ProductInfo.Name: Generic SEA-C101 2x BNC 100ft Cable with 2x Female to Female Coupler for Security Samsung Products
